entry.string: 1.1 Grant rights for an unregistered user
entry.translation: 1.1 Für einen unregistrierten Nutzer gewährte Rechte

entry.string: Unregistered users have their own set of rights. By default, unregistered users may view existing entries only. You may grant unregistered users the rights to edit and delete records created by other unregistered users only. Administrators may view / edit / delete any record created by an unregistered user.
entry.translation: Unregistrierte Nutzer haben ihre eigene Rechteeinstellung. Standardmäßig können unregistrierte Nutzer nur bestehende Einträge ansehen. Sie können unregistrierten Nutzern das Bearbeitungs- oder Löschrecht für Datensätze einräumen, die von unregistrierten Nutzern angelegt worden sind. Administartoren können jeden Datensatz anscheuen/ bearbeiten / löschen, der von einem unregistrierten Nutzer angelegt wurde.

entry.string: 1.2 Grant right for registered users
entry.translation: 1.2 Für einen registrierten Nutzer gewährte Rechte

entry.string: Registered users have their own set of rights. By default, registered users can create records, view records, and delete records. You can restrict access by deselecting grants. Registered users can edit records created by that user account only. All other records are view only. Records marked as private can be viewed only by the user that created the record and no one else save Administrators. Administrators may view / edit / delete any record created by a registered user.
2.1 Title of this Address Book
Enter the title which will appear to all users.
entry.translation: Bitte den Titel angeben, der allen Nutzern angezeigt werden soll.

entry.string: 2.3 Default and Alternate sort order / List View

Select two columns of your choice. This setting affects not only the sort order but also the display of columns in the list view. Users are allowed to select between the Default and Alternate sort orders.
entry.translation: Suchen Sie sich zwei Spalten Ihrer Wahl aus. Diese Einstellung nicht nur die Sortierreihenfolge sondern auch die Anzeige der Spalten in der Listenansicht. Nutzer können zwischen der Standard- und der Alternativsortierreihenfolge wählen.

entry.string: 2.4 Name display in list view and sort order for name information
This setting is for the sort order and display of names in the list view. You can change the default «Last Name, First Name» to «First Name Last Name», which is default in some countries.
2.5 Special character (Umlauts) replacement for sort columns
entry.translation: 2.5 Spezielle Zeichen (Umlaute) für die Spaltensortierung ersetzen

entry.string: MySQL 3.x uses the Latin-1 character set as default. Most users have no permission to change these settings. Therefore names and companies are now stored in special sort columns for correct sorting when special characters (Umlauts) are used. There is an admin setting where you can set up the character replacement to correct the sort for each language.
2.6 Personal address book mode

The Address Book may be used as a Global AddressBook (unchecked by default) or a Personal AddressBook (checked). As a Global AddressBook all users with access may view records that are NOT marked Private. As a Personal AddressBook users may only view entries they have created and unregistered users may not view or create any entries.
2.7 Do you want to use a prefix field?
Prefix/Title (Mr. Mrs. etc.). Values can be set in
Administration Panel and are optionally selected via a drop-down list when creating / editing an entry. This field is hidden by default.
2.8 Do you want to use images/logos?

Administrators will see a selection box of all files in the xarimages directory of AddressBook and can assign it to a record. The picture is shown in the upper right of the detail page. Currently, all pictures must be manually uploaded into the xarimages directory of AddressBook. This field is hidden by default.
2.9 Disable the menu

If you want to use the AddressBook as a simple contact list, you might want to disable the menu completely. You can also disable it for guests only. Note, Administrators always see the full menu, regardless of this setting.
2.10 Disable the second line of the main menu
entry.translation: 2.10 Zweite Zeile des Hauptmenüs nicht anzeigen

entry.string: This hides the second menu line for all users who DO NOT have edit access. Users still have access to the categories, sort order and the search field, but not access to Private records, A-Z / Complete list view switch, and the Add New Record link.
2.11 Show zip before city
In Europe the postal code (zip in USA) is shown before the city. This option is off by default.
entry.translation: In Europa wird die Postleitzahl (zip in den USA) vor dem Städtenamen angezeigt. Standarmäßig ist diese Option ausgeschaltet.

entry.string: 2.12 Records viewed per page
Pick your number between 1 and ??
3.1 Custom tab
Name of the Custom Fields tab and the headline for custom fields in the detail page. Leave it blank, if you do not use custom fields.
3.2 Width of TEXTAREA fields

TEXTAREA field width can change depending on the CSS of your theme. Sometimes this results in a very bad layout of your form. You can set the html COLS of a TEXTAREA field. Valid size ranges from 4 to 100.
3.3 Format for date entries
Select the format for date entry and display. Only two options at this time, MM.DD.YYYY and DD.MM.YYYY.
entry.translation: Wählen Sie das Format für Datumseingabe und -anzeige aus: Momentan gibt es nur zwei Wahlmöglichkeiten: MM.DD.YYYY and DD.MM.YYYY.

entry.string: 3.4 Format for numeric values
Select the format for numeric entry and display. Only two options at this time, 9,999.00 and 9.999,00
entry.translation: Wählen Sie das Format für Zahleneingabe und -anzeige aus: Momentan gibt es nur zwei Wahlmöglichkeiten: 9,999.00 and 9.999,00

entry.string: 4.1 Send error reports to Site Admin
This option enables error messages to be emailed directly to the site administrator email account. Uncheck to disable this feature.
entry.translation: Diese Option ermöglicht den Versand von Fehlermeldungen direkt an die E-Mailadresse des Administrators. Nicht auswählen, um dieses Feature zu deaktivieren.

entry.string: 4.2 Alternate Site Admin email address
Choose an alternate email address if the official Site Admin does not wish to receive AddressBook error notifications.
entry.translation: Wählen Sie eine alternative E-Mailadresse, wenn der Administartor der Website keine Fehlerbenachrichtigungen erhalten will.

entry.string: 4.3 Send error reports to AddressBook Quality Control

This option sends an email directly to the AddressBook development team with the error message, date and time of occurrence, and the fully qualified host name of the server running the AddressBook module. NO OTHER INFORMATION IS SENT. This information is used solely for the purpose of fixing issues encountered in the AddressBook module. Uncheck to disable this feature.
entry.translation: Wenn Sie diese Option auswählen, wird eine E-Mail direkt an das AdressBuch-Entwicklerteam gesandt. Diese enthält die Fehlermeldung, Datum und Zeit, zu dem der Fehler auftrat, und den Hostnamen des Servers, auf dem das AdressBuch-Modul läuft. ES WERDEN KEINE WEITEREN INFORMATIONEN VERSANDT. Diese Information dient ausschließlich dazu, Fehler des AdressBuch-Moduls zu beseitigen. Um diese Option zu deaktvieren, Auswahl aufheben.
